job_description: 📢 Hiring Alert: React Native Developer 📢Position Title: 📢 React Native Developer 📢📍Job Location: Offshore - remote Desired Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Experience: 5+ YearsContract: 12 months (Extendable)Number of positions: 01Job Description:We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic React Native Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate should have at least 5 years of experience in mobile app development using React Native and a passion for building high-quality applications. You will work closely with senior developers, designers, and product managers to create seamless, user-friendly mobile experiences.Responsibilities:●    Assist in the development and maintenance of cross-platform mobile applications using React Native.●    Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.●    Work collaboratively with designers, product managers, and backend developers to implement UI/UX designs.●    Debug and troubleshoot issues to ensure optimal application performance.●    Participate in code reviews and learn from senior developers.●    Stay up to date with emerging trends and technologies in mobile development.Requirements:●    Min 5 years of experience with React Native and JavaScript (or TypeScript).●    Understanding of React.js, Redux, or Context API for state management.●    Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming.●    Knowledge of mobile development concepts (responsive design, navigation, animations, etc.).●    Basic understanding of Git and version control workflows.●    Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to learn.●    Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.Nice to have:●    Experience with Expo or native iOS/Android development.●    Familiarity with Firebase, GraphQL, or third-party API integrations.●    Knowledge of Agile development methodologies.●    Experience working with CI/CD pipelines.📩If you are interested in this opportunity, please send your resume to hr@endemandit.com ensuring the position name is included in the subject line. Additionally, please provide the following information:💼 Relevant years of experience: -📍 Current location: -💰 Current Salary: -💰 Expected Salary: -📆 Notice period: -
